alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:13AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG AFFECTING AREAS IN NORTH CENTRAL TO NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... Areas of locally dense fog will affect areas along and south of the Iron Range and along the Minnesota-Wisconsin border, including the cities of Brainerd, Walker, Grand Rapids, Aitkin, Moose Lake, and Siren. Visibilities of 3/4 to 1/4 mile have already been observed, which should persist in this morning. Visibilities are expected to improve through this morning. If traveling early this morning, reduce your speed and use low- beam headlights when encountering foggy areas. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed. Keep updated on the latest forecast for fog development trends.
